about_the_game:
"Morning light" is a brave knight, their castle is besieged by monsters, the food in the castle can no longer support people's life, he had to stand up to look for food outside for people.

Forest Knight is an adventure game. Players can "click the mouse" to control the knight's jump to avoid the monster.

You have to be flexible enough to survive the monster and get as much food as possible.

Being hit by a monster lowers your health, and when hit, the knight dies. There is no way to attack in this game. All you have to do is avoid it. The monster's movement mode needs to be explored by the player himself. Patterns are easier to find. I hope the players can get more food for the people.

Maybe you'll find some unexpected surprises in the game. Maybe we will find more beauty in casual.

We have added a new knight, more knights to participate in this guardian, you can choose a knight you like to adventure.
